name: Aerosystems International
tag_list: aerospace-equipment, spectrum-management, spectrum-monitoring, ground-support-equipment, aircraft-ground-power-units, aircraft-tugs, df-antennas, portable-antennas
overview:
Aerosystems International Inc (ASI) was originally founded in 1971 as an organization to provide technical and managerial consulting in the field of transportation and telecommunications.

ASI moved into manufacturing arena in 1989, in response to demand from the local aerospace sector for design and manufacturing capacity. The company has expanded its product range substantially over the past years. ASI specializes in limited product runs while having the capacity of being able to handle large scale projects.
